amendment.description: Manager's amendments consist of the text of the amendments contained in House Report 110-151 and printed on pages H5278-H5279 in the Congressional Record for May 16, 2007.
amendment.purpose: An amendment comprised on the following amendments offered en bloc: Amendments nos. 4, 19, 28. 34, 35, 40, and 42 printed in House Report 110-151.

action.text: On agreeing to the Skelton amendments (A017) Agreed to by voice vote.
